mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESERVATION R WHERE R.ID = #{reservationId}

SELECT R.ID as RESERVATION_ID, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.STATUS, S.NAME as SEAT_NAME, F.FLOOR, B.NAME as BUILDING_NAME FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SEAT S ON R.SEAT_ID = S.ID JOIN FLOOR F ON S.FLOOR_ID = F.ID JOIN BUILDING B ON F.BUILDING_ID = B.ID WHERE R.START_TIME < #{endTime} AND R.END_TIME > #{startTime} OFFSET #{skip} LIMIT ${limit}

SELECT R.ID as RESERVATION_ID, R.START_TIME, R.END_TIME, R.STATUS, S.NAME as SEAT_NAME, F.FLOOR, B.NAME as BUILDING_NAME, R.EXTENDED_FROM_RESERVATION_ID FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SEAT S ON R.SEAT_ID = S.ID JOIN FLOOR F ON S.FLOOR_ID = F.ID JOIN BUILDING B ON F.BUILDING_ID = B.ID WHERE R.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION R SET R.STATUS = 'CANCELLED' WHERE R.ID = #{reservationId}
UPDATE RESERVATION R SET R.STATUS = #{status} WHERE R.ID = #{reservationId}
